name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-app-hello-world-csharp
title: Microsoft Teams C# Helloworld Sample
shortDescription: A Microsoft Teams Hello World sample app built with .NET/C# that demonstrates essential features like tabs, bots, and messaging extensions for seamless interaction within the Teams environment.
longDescription: The Microsoft Teams C# Hello World Sample app demonstrates the integration of essential Microsoft Teams functionalities, including tabs, bots, and messaging extensions, built using .NET/C#. This sample provides a hands-on experience for developers to explore and implement interactive app components within the Microsoft Teams environment.
